docs.title: GetTrucked API Documentation
docs.text:
Welcome to the Smart Cargo API documentation. This API allows you to manage users, shipments (loads), vehicles (lorries), and more for the Smart Cargo platform.

Project Repository: Peak-Soft/Smart-Cargo-BackOffice

docs.title: Base URL
docs.text:
All endpoints are prefixed with /v1.

http://api.smartcargo.com/v1

(Replace api.smartcargo.com with your actual domain)

docs.title: Authentication
docs.text: The API uses Laravel Sanctum for authentication.

docs.title: sending the Token
docs.text:
To access protected endpoints, you must include the Authorization header with a valid Bearer token.

Authorization: Bearer <your_token>
Accept: application/json

docs.title: Getting a Token
docs.text: You can obtain a token by logging in via the /tokens endpoint.

docs.title: Response Format
docs.text:
The API generally uses a standard unified response format:

{
  "data": { ... },
  "message": "Operation successful",
  "status": 200
}
  • data: The requested resource or result object.
  • message: A human-readable message describing the result.
  • status: The HTTP status code (mirrored).

docs.title: Authentication
docs.text: Manage user access and session tokens.

docs.title: Sign Up
docs.text: Register a new user account.

docs.title: Endpoint
docs.text: POST /signup

docs.title: Request Body
docs.text: Field Type Required Description name string Yes Full name of the user. email string Yes Valid email address. password string Yes Password for the account. type string Yes User type (e.g., driver, shipper). phone string No Contact number.

docs.title: Example Request
docs.text:
{
    "name": "John Doe",
    "email": "john@example.com",
    "password": "securepassword123",
    "type": "driver"
}

docs.title: Response
docs.text:
Returns the created user object and an access token.

{
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "John Doe",
        "email": "john@example.com",
        "type": "driver",
        "token": "1|laravel_sanctum_token_string..."
    },
    "message": "user created successfuly",
    "status": 201
}

docs.title: Login (Create Token)
docs.text: Authenticate a user and retrieve a personal access token.

docs.title: Endpoint
docs.text: POST /tokens

docs.title: Request Body
docs.text: Field Type Required Description email string Yes Registered email address. password string Yes User password. device_name string No Optional device identifier.

docs.title: Example Request
docs.text:
{
    "email": "john@example.com",
    "password": "securepassword123",
    "device_name": "mobile_app"
}

docs.title: Response
docs.text:
{
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "John Doe",
        "email": "john@example.com",
        "token": "2|new_token_string..."
    },
    "message": "Token created successfully",
    "status": 200
}

docs.title: Logout
docs.text: Invalidate the user's current token.

docs.title: Endpoint
docs.text:
POST /logout

Requires Authentication

You must provide a valid Bearer token in the header.

docs.title: Response
docs.text:
{
    "data": null,
    "message": "Logged out successfully",
    "status": 200
}

docs.title: Users (users)
docs.text:
Core user table for drivers, shippers, and companies.

Column Type Description id bigint Primary Key name string email string Unique password string mobile string type enum user, company, admin is_verified enum 0 (Pending), 1 (Processed), 2 (Verified), 3 (Unverified) country_code string refer_code string fcm_token string Firebase Token

docs.title: Loads (loads)
docs.text:
Shipment requests posted by users.

Column Type Description id bigint Primary Key owner_id foreignId FK to users description string weight double amount double status enum pending, accepted, in_progress, etc. pickup_point string Address/Name drop_point string Address/Name pick_state_id foreignId FK to states drop_state_id foreignId FK to states bidder_id string FK to users (nullable) lorry_id string FK to lorries (nullable)

docs.title: Bids (bids)
docs.text:
Offers made by drivers/companies on loads.

Column Type Description id bigint Primary Key load_id foreignId FK to loads owner_id foreignId FK to users (Bidder) lorry_id foreignId FK to lorries amount decimal Bid Amount status string Status of the bid

docs.title: Vehicles (vehicles)
docs.text:
General vehicle profiles (metadata).

Column Type Description id bigint Primary Key owner_id foreignId FK to users matricule string License Plate type enum truck, van

docs.title: Lorries (lorries)
docs.text:
Specific truck instances with route and state tracking.

Column Type Description id bigint Primary Key owner_id foreignId FK to users lorry_no string weight double Capacity curr_state_id foreignId FK to states status boolean Availability

docs.title: Wallets (wallets)
docs.text:
User balance information.

Column Type Description id bigint Primary Key user_id foreignId FK to users balance double

docs.title: Countries (countries)
docs.text: Column Type Description id bigint PK country_code string

docs.title: States (states)
docs.text: Column Type Description id bigint PK country_id foreignId FK to countries stateName string

docs.title: Communes (communes)
docs.text: Column Type Description id bigint PK state_id foreignId FK to states commune_name string

docs.title: Conversations (conversations)
docs.text: Column Type Description id string Primary Key (UUID/String) user1_id string user2_id string

docs.title: Messages (messages)
docs.text: Column Type Description id bigint PK conversation_id string FK to conversations sender_id string message text

docs.title: Other Tables
docs.text:
• reviews: user_id, load_id, rate_number, rate_text.
  • notifications: user_id, notification_type, description.
  • documents: user_id, imgPath, description.
  • payment_orders: wallet_id, balance, status.
  • book_loads: flattened table for booking records.
  • bid_load: snapshot table for lorry details in bids.

docs.title: Messaging
docs.text: Real-time messaging between users (e.g., Shipper and Driver).

docs.title: Get / Create Conversation
docs.text:
Start a conversation with another user or retrieve an existing one.

Endpoint: POST /conversations

Body: 

{
    "user_id": 45
}
(user_id is the ID of the other participant)

docs.title: List Conversations
docs.text:
Get all conversations for the authenticated user.

Endpoint: GET /conversations

docs.title: Get Messages
docs.text:
Retrieve message history for a specific conversation.

Endpoint: GET /conversations/{conversationId}/messages

docs.title: Send Message
docs.text:
Endpoint: POST /conversations/{conversationId}/messages

Body: 

{
    "message": "Hello, is the cargo ready?"
}

docs.title: Mark as Seen
docs.text:
Mark all messages in a conversation as read.

Endpoint: POST /conversations/{conversationId}/seen

docs.title: Request Schemas
docs.text: This reference details the required and optional fields for POST (Creation) and PUT/PATCH (Update) operations.

docs.title: Common Validation Rules
docs.text:
• required: Field must be present and not empty.
  • sometimes: Field is validated only if present.
  • exists:table,column: Value must exist in the database.
  • unique:table,column: Value must not already exist in the database.
  • in:foo,bar: Value must be one of the listed options.

docs.title: Create User (POST /signup)
docs.text: See Authentication.

docs.title: Update User (PUT/PATCH /users/{id})
docs.text: No strict validation rules defined in middleware. Standard user fields are accepted.

docs.title: Create Load (POST /loads)
docs.text: Field Rules Description owner_id required, exists:users,id ID of the shipper. vehicle_id nullable Specific vehicle assignment. description nullable, string Details about the cargo. pick_lat float Pickup Latitude. pick_lng float Pickup Longitude. drop_lat float Drop-off Latitude. drop_lng float Drop-off Longitude. weight numeric Cargo weight (kg/tons). price numeric Offered price.

docs.title: Update Load (PUT /loads/{id})
docs.text:
Method: PUT (Replace) - All fields required. Method: PATCH (Modify) - All fields optional (sometimes).

Field Rules description string, max:255 visible_hours string amount string weight string total_amount string vehicle_id string material_name string owner_id string status in:pending,accepted,rejected,in_progress,completed,cancelled pickup_point string pick_name string pick_mobile string pick_state_id string pick_lat string pick_lng string drop_point string drop_name string drop_mobile string drop_state_id string drop_lat string drop_lng string

docs.title: Create Bid (POST /bids)
docs.text: Field Rules load_id required, exists:loads,id owner_id required, exists:users,id amount required, numeric available_date required, date_format:d/m/Y status required, in:pending,accepted,rejected

docs.title: Update Bid (PUT/PATCH /bids/{id})
docs.text: Field Rules amount sometimes, numeric available_date sometimes, date_format:d/m/Y status sometimes, in:pending,accepted,rejected

docs.title: Create Lorry (POST /lorries)
docs.text: Field Rules owner_id required, exists:users,id lorry_no required, unique:lorries,lorry_no vehicle_id required weight required, numeric size required, numeric curr_state_id required, exists:states,id description nullable routes sometimes curr_location nullable status boolean

docs.title: Update Lorry (PUT/PATCH /lorries/{id})
docs.text: Field Rules owner_id sometimes, exists:users,id lorry_no sometimes, unique:lorries,lorry_no weight sometimes, numeric size sometimes, numeric curr_state_id sometimes, exists:states,id status boolean

docs.title: Create Document (POST /documents)
docs.text: Field Rules user_id required, exists:users,id file required, file, mimes:jpg,png,pdf,doc, max:2048 description nullable

docs.title: Update Document (PUT/PATCH /documents/{id})
docs.text: Field Rules user_id required/sometimes description nullable/sometimes file_path required/sometimes

docs.title: Create/Update (POST/PUT/PATCH)
docs.text: Field Rules user_id required (or sometimes on PATCH) load_id required (or sometimes on PATCH)

docs.title: Create Wallet (POST /wallet)
docs.text: Field Rules user_id required, exists:users,id balance required, numeric, min:0

docs.title: Update Wallet (PATCH /wallet_up / /wallet_down)
docs.text: Field Rules balance required, numeric, min:0 method required, string

docs.title: Countries
docs.text: Field Rules country_name required country_code required, max:10 mobile_prefix required, max:10 isActive required, boolean

docs.title: Communes
docs.text: Field Rules state_id required, exists:states,id commune_name required commune_code required, unique:communes

docs.title: Points
docs.text: Field Rules lat required, numeric lang required, numeric person_name required person_mobile required

docs.title: Notifications
docs.text: Field Rules notification_type required, in:fail,success,info,warning description required user_id required, exists:users,id is_read boolean

docs.title: Reviews
docs.text: Field Rules rate_number required rate_text nullable

docs.title: Resources
docs.text: Access and manage the entities of the Smart Cargo platform.

docs.title: Common Parameters
docs.text:
Most GET endpoints invoke a list action and support the following query parameters:

  • page: Page number for pagination (default: 1).
  • per_page: Number of items per page (default: 15).
  • json: Set to true or 1 to force a pure JSON response.

docs.title: Users
docs.text:
Manage user profiles.

Method Endpoint Description GET /users List all users. GET /users/{id} Get user details. PUT /users/{id} Update user profile. DELETE /users/{id} Delete a user. POST /profile_image_update/{id} Upload a new profile picture. POST /users/fcm-token Update Firebase Cloud Messaging token.

docs.title: Upload Profile Image
docs.text:
Endpoint: POST /profile_image_update/{id} (Multipart)

  • parts[]: Array of image files.

docs.title: Loads
docs.text:
Manage cargo shipments.

Method Endpoint Description GET /loads List available loads. POST /loads Post a new load. GET /loads/{id} Get load details. PUT /loads/{id} Update load. DELETE /loads/{id} Delete load.

Create Body: 

{
    "owner_id": 1,
    "pick_lat": 36.75, "pick_lng": 3.05,
    "drop_lat": 35.69, "drop_lng": -0.63,
    "weight": 1000,
    "price": 5000,
    "description": "Furniture"
}

docs.title: Bids
docs.text:
Manage bids placed on loads.

Method Endpoint Description GET /bids List bids. POST /bids Place a bid. GET /bids/{id} Get bid details. PUT /bids/{id} Update bid. DELETE /bids/{id} Withdraw bid.

Create Body: 

{
    "load_id": 10,
    "owner_id": 2,
    "amount": 4500,
    "available_date": "15/01/2026",
    "status": "pending"
}

docs.title: Lorries (Vehicles)
docs.text:
Manage the detailed fleet of lorries/trucks.

Method Endpoint Description GET /lorries List lorries. POST /lorries Register a new lorry. GET /lorries/{id} Get details. PUT /lorries/{id} Update details. DELETE /lorries/{id} Delete lorry. GET /lorries/getLorryList/{owner_id}/{load_id} Get available lorries for a specific load.

Create Body: 

{
    "owner_id": 1,
    "lorry_no": "ABC-123-DZ",
    "vehicle_id": "truck_01",
    "weight": 5000,
    "size": 20,
    "curr_state_id": 5,
    "description": "Optional description"
}

docs.title: Wallet
docs.text:
Manage user balances and transactions.

Method Endpoint Description GET /wallet List wallets. POST /wallet Create wallet. GET /wallet/{id} Get wallet (includes transactions). PATCH /wallet_up/{id} Add funds. PATCH /wallet_down/{id} Deduct funds.

Modify Balance Body (PATCH): 

{
    "balance": 1000,
    "method": "paypal"
}

docs.title: Countries
docs.text:
Base endpoint: /countries

Create Fields: - country_name (string) - country_code (string, e.g., "DZ") - mobile_prefix (string, e.g., "+213") - isActive (boolean)

docs.title: States
docs.text:
Base endpoint: /states

Custom: POST /states/getStatesId - Body: {"drop_state_name": "Oran", "pick_state_name": "Algiers"} - Returns: IDs for the states.

docs.title: Communes
docs.text:
Base endpoint: /communes

Create Fields: - state_id (exists in states) - commune_name - commune_code (unique)

docs.title: Points
docs.text:
Address points or landmarks. Base endpoint: /points

Create Body: 

{
    "lat": 36.75,
    "lang": 3.05,
    "person_name": "Contact Name",
    "person_mobile": "0550000000"
}

docs.title: Reviews
docs.text:
Manage user ratings and reviews. Base endpoint: /reviews

Create Body: 

{
    "rate_number": 5,
    "rate_text": "Great service!",
    "user_id": 2
}

docs.title: Notifications
docs.text:
System notifications for users. Base endpoint: /notifications

Create Body: 

{
    "user_id": 1,
    "notification_type": "info",
    "description": "Your load has been delivered.",
    "is_read": false
}
Types: fail, success, info, warning

docs.title: Utilities
docs.text: Helper endpoints for public data and services.

docs.title: Get Countries
docs.text:
List available countries for registration/service.

GET /get_countries

docs.title: Places Autocomplete
docs.text:
Search for addresses and coordinates (powered by OpenStreetMap).

GET /places/autocomplete?query={search_term}

Example: /places/autocomplete?query=Algiers

Response: 

[
    {
        "name": "Algiers, Algeria",
        "lat": "36.7525",
        "lon": "3.04197",
        "type": "city",
        "address": { ... }
    }
]

docs.title: Get Payment Methods
docs.text:
List supported payment gateways and methods.

GET /payments

Response Example: 

{
    "data": [
        {
            "id": "1",
            "title": "Paypal",
            "status": "1"
        },
        {
            "id": "5",
            "title": "Cash On Delivery",
            "status": "1"
        }
    ],
    "message": "Payments retrieved successfully",
    "status": 200
}

docs.title: FAQ
docs.text:
Retrieve Frequently Asked Questions.

GET /help/faq
